extendedInfo.description: The Hottest Party Game on the Market just became Pro! Ranging from sexual truths to all out kissing and rubbing pranks, Truth or Dare 18+ Pro has everything you need for the party no one will forget. With over 80 topics, Truth or Dare 18+ Pro will keep you entertained for hours and give you one of the best times of your life!Upgrade to Pro for:**100% AD-FREE Gameplay****20 More Topics than the Original****More Players**In addition, your are supporting the developer!Still not sure?Try out Truth or Dare 18+ and see the game people keep talking about!Testimonials* This app made me kiss my best friend all over his body. -Jessica B, 18.*Everyone keeps talking about my party and the truth or dare game we played.-Michael M, 19.*Best app ever!!! Never want to forget the night we used this!-Shannon F, 20.
